sub_028_middlef_00:
My, my—I sense great depths to your past.
You must have seen much in lives gone by.
sub_028_middlef_01:
I can study your Rotom Phone to peer into past
lives you’ve lived. I call it Rotometry! Care to try?
sub_028_middlef_02:
Hm, perhaps we’d best leave it alone after all.
I can sense your suspicion of me...
sub_028_middlef_03:
Ahhh, your past... It drifts before my eyes! I see a
life you once lived in— Oh, where is this...?
sub_028_middlef_04:
Yes, yes! It’s coming into clearer focus! In this
previous life, you once tread the grounds of...
sub_028_middlef_a:
Kanto! I see you and a beloved Pokémon on an
adventure in the Kanto region, urging each other\r
onward with a bold “Let’s go!”
sub_028_middlef_b:
Galar! I see you facing down enormous
challenges in the Galar region with equally\r
enormous Dynamax Pokémon at your side!
sub_028_middlef_c:
Sinnoh! I see you digging beneath the surface
of the Sinnoh region itself and dazzling crowds\r
in Super Contest Shows!
sub_028_middlef_d:
Hisui! I see you braving a great adventure in the
Hisui region, an odd phone gripped in your hand!\r
Wait—where is “Hisui”? I’ve never heard of it...
sub_028_middlef_05:
Allow me to fashion for your Rotom Phone a case
that befits your memories.
sub_028_middlef_07: Your case is finished. Carry it proudly!
sub_028_system_a: You got the [VAR COLOR(0008)]Pika-Vee case[VAR COLOR(0000)]!
sub_028_system_b: You got the [VAR COLOR(0008)]Ball Guy case[VAR COLOR(0000)]!
sub_028_system_c: You got the [VAR COLOR(0008)]Pokétch case[VAR COLOR(0000)]!
sub_028_system_d: You got the [VAR COLOR(0008)]Arc Phone case[VAR COLOR(0000)]!
sub_028_middlef_08:
If you wish to plumb your memories for more
past lives, come speak to me again.
sub_028_middlef_09:
Never have I met one who has lived so widely
as you! I’m honored to have divined your past.
sub_028_middlef_10:
I hope your Rotom Phone cases serve you well.
May your past lives live on in them.
